Station Name (LEA): AL STATE UNIV  POLICE DEPT HI_ED
Justification: THE POLICE DEPARTMENT WILL UTILIZE THIS EQUIPMENT AROUND VARIOUS AREAS OF THE CAMPUS, TO INCLUDE THE 13 RESIDENT HALLS LOCATED ON THE CAMPUS. THIS EQUIPMENT WILL ASSIST IN THE OVERALL SECURITY AND WELL BEING OF THE STUDENTS AND STAFF OF THE UNIVERSITY. APPROVAL WILL PROVE TO BE GIVING THE UNIVERSITY A VALUABLE TOOL TO AID IN THE SECURITY OF THE CAMPUS.

THE ALABAMA LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCY CURRENTLY OPERATES A UH-1H HELICOPTER.  THE UNIT SUPPORTS STATE, LOCAL AND FEDERAL AGENCIES IN A LAW ENFORCEMENT CAPACITY.  THIS AIRCRAFT IS USED IN THE SUPPORT OF OUR RESCUE PROGRAM, TACTICAL OPERATIONS AND HOMELAND SECURITY MISSIONS.  THIS PART WILL CONTINUE TO SUSTAIN UNIT OPERATIONS FOR THE FUTURE.

THE SARTELL POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD USE THE MINE DETECTING SET FOR ITS METAL DETECTING PROPERTIES TO ASSIST OFFICERS WITH LOCATING METAL OBJECTS AT CRIME SCENES. METAL DETECTORS WOULD HAVE ASSISTED WITH LOCATING THE EVIDENCE FOR CRIMINAL PROSECUTION AND HELP KEEP THE PUBLIC SAFE.

THE SARTELL POLICE DEPARTMENT WILL USE A SPOTTING SCOPE WHEN PATROL OFFICERS ARE AT THE RANGE TRAINING WITH THE PATROL RIFLES. COMPRESSED AIR DUSTER WILL BE USED BY THE SHERIFFS OFFICE FOR CLEANING SENSITIVE ITEMS USED BY SEVERAL DIVISIONS.  THESE ITEMS MAY INCLUDE CAMERAS AND COMPUTERS USED BY INVESTIGATIONS.  MAY ALSO INCLUDE NIGHT VISION AND ROBOTICS USED BY SWAT.  RECREATIONAL ENFORCEMENT MAY USE IT FOR CLEANING BINOCULARS AND SPOTTING SCOPES.

THE SHERBURNE COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS REQUESTING BOOTS FOR USE BY MULTIPLE DIVISIONS.  BOOTS WILL PROVIDE WATERPROOF FOOTWEAR THAT IS RUGGED AND DESIGNED FOR ADVERSE CONDITIONS.  SWAT AND RECREATIONAL ENFORCEMENT AND PATROL WILL BE THE PRIMARY USERS OF THE EQUIPMENT.

THE SHERIFF'S OFFICE IS REQUESTING SNIPER DRAG BAGS FOR THE SNIPER UNIT ASSIGNED TO SWAT.  THIS UNIT WILL BE ABLE TO UTILIZE THE RIFLE CASES FOR STORING AND TRANSPORTING THEIR RIFLES.  THE CASES ARE DESIGNED TO BE USED IN THE FIELD WHILE MOVING TO AND FROM POSITIONS OF COVER AND CONCEALMENT.  THIS WILL AID OPERATORS WHILE CONDUCTING COVERT SURVEILLANCE AND RESPONDING TO HIGH RISK CALL OUTS.

THESE BAGS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE BY THE SHERIFFS OFFICE MOBILE FIELD FORCE.  THIS UNIT WILL USE THE BAGS TO ORGANIZE AND STORE EQUIPMENT.  THIS WILL KEEP OFFICERS ASSIGNED TO THIS UNIT READY FOR DEPLOYMENT AT ALL TIMES.  THE UNIT RESPONDS TO CIVIL DISORDERS AND OTHER DISTURBANCES INVOLVING LARGE CROWDS.

HAND CLEANER IS BEING REQUESTED FOR USE BY THE SHERIFFS OFFICE FOR GENERAL HYGIENE AND CLEAN UP.  THIS CLEANER WILL PROVIDE OFFICERS WITH A MEANS OF EASILY CLEANING THEIR HANDS WHILE IN THE FIELD CONDUCTING INVESTIGATIONS OR WORKING ENFORCEMENT.  HAND CLEANER IS A CONSUMABLE ITEM IN CONSTANT NEED BY THE SHERIFFS OFFICE.

DUST REMOVER OR COMPRESSED AIR CANS ARE USED IN MANY AREAS OF THE SHERIFFS OFFICE.  THEY WORK WELL FOR KEEPING COMPUTERS AND CAMERAS AND OFFICE EQUIPMENT CLEAN AND FREE OF DUST.  THE AIR IS ALSO USED BY OFFICERS WHEN CLEANING ROBOTS AND NIGHT VISION AND THERMAL DEVICES OBTAINED THROUGH THE 1033 PROGRAM.

THE SHERBURNE COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS REQUESTING FOOTWEAR FOR THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE UNIT.  ALL TERRAIN  FOOTWEAR  WILL PROVIDE A RUGGED WATER PROOF BOOT FOR USE IN ADVERSE CONDITIONS.  THIS WILL REDUCE OFFICER FATIGUE WHEN DEPLOYED ON HIGH RISK SEARCH AND ARREST WARRANTS.

THE SHERIFFS OFFICE IS REQUESTING THESE DIRECTIONAL LASER UNITS FOR USE BY SWAT AND THE MOBILE FIELD FORCE.  THE LASER USES AN EYE SAFE LASER TO DISRUPT A POTENTIAL COMBATANTS INTENTIONS.  THIS ALLOWS OFFICERS TO DIRECT NON LETHAL FORCE AT A POTENTIAL COMBATANT FROM A SAFE DISTANCE.  THE ABILITY TO ENGAGE AN INDIVIDUAL FROM A DISTANCE WITHOUT PHYSICAL CONTACT PROVIDES A SAFE RESOLUTION FOR THE OFFICER AND SUSPECT.

THE SHERBURNE COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS REQUESTING THESE LIGHTS FOR USE ON MULTIPLE VEHICLES.  THEY WILL BE USED PRIMARILY ON OUR AGENCIES MRAP TO PROVIDE 360 DEGREE SCENE LIGHTING BY MOUNTING THEM IN ALL CORNERS.  LIGHTS WILL ALSO BE PLACED ON OTHER VEHICLES USE BY SWAT AND BOATS USED BY THE RECREATIONAL ENFORCEMENT DIVISION.  THE LIGHTS WILL PROVIDE OFFICERS WITH SCENE LIGHTING WHILE CONDUCTING THEIR ENFORCEMENT DUTIES.

THE SHERBURNE COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE HAS THE SHERBURNE NATIONAL WILDLIFE REFUGE AND THE SAND DUNES STATE FOREST IN ITS JURISDICTION.  THESE PIECES OF LAND COVER ROUGHLY 25 PERCENT OF THE COUNTY.  THE AREAS HAVE LIMITED ACCESS AND OFF ROAD VEHICLES ARE USED TO CONDUCT ENFORCEMENT AND SEARCH AND RESCUE OPERATIONS.  THESE OFF ROAD VEHICLES WOULD AID IN GETTING OFFICERS AND EQUIPMENT INTO AND OUT OF THESE AREAS WHEN CONDUCTING THEIR DUTIES.

PACKS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE UNIT. THIS UNIT WILL USE THE PACKS FOR OFF-SITE TRAINING ACTIVITIES. THE PACKS WILL ALLOW OPERATORS TO ORGANIZE AND TRAVEL WITH EQUIPMENT NECESSARY FOR TRAINING.

THE SHERIFFS OFFICE IS REQUESTING SNOWSHOES FOR USE BY THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE UNIT AND THE RECREATIONAL ENFORCEMENT DIVISION. BOTH DIVISIONS CONDUCT PATROLS AND SURVEILLANCE OPERATIONS DURING THE WINTER MONTHS IN DEEP SNOW. SNOWSHOES WILL AID OFFICERS IN SAFELY MANEUVERING THROUGH THESE CONDITIONS. SEARCH AND RESCUE OPERATIONS MAY OCCUR IN SIMILAR CONDITIONS.
THESE POWER SUPPLIES ARE USED TO JUMP START VEHICLES OPERATING ON A 24V SYSTEM.  THE PACKS WILL PROVIDE A SECONDARY POWER SOURCE IN THE EVENT OF A DRAINED OR DEAD POWER SYSTEM ON OUR AGENCIES MRAP.

THE SHERIFFS OFFICE IS REQUESTING COLLAPSIBLE LITTERS TO BE PLACED IN TACTICAL VEHICLES AND UTVS. THE LITTERS ARE COMPACT AND LIGHT WEIGHT. THEY ARE EASILY STORED IN VEHICLES FOR FAST DEPLOYMENT ON SCENE. THE LITTERS ALSO HAVE A CARRIER OPTION ALLOWING THEM TO BE CARRIED HANDS FREE BY ONE PERSON.

THE SHERIFFS OFFICE IS REQUESTING THESE CARRIERS FOR USE WITH COLLAPSIBLE LITTERS. THE CARRIER ALLOWS A SPECIFFIC NAR TALON LITTER TO BE STORED AND CARRIED. THE CARRIER HAS BACKPACK STRAPS ALLOWING A SINGLE PERSON TO MOVE FREELY WHILE TRANSPORTING THE LITTER. THIS IMPROVES THE SPEED IN WHICH AN OFFICER CAN MOVE A LITTER TO A PATIENT.

THE SHERBURNE COUNTY SHERIFFS OFFICE IS REQUESTING THESE THERMAL UNITS TO REPLACE OLDER MODELS.  THERMAL DEVICES ARE USED OFTEN BY PATROL STAFF WHEN SEARCHING FOR SUSPECTS OR LOST PERSONS.  THE THERMAL DEVICES OFFER DETECTION ABILITY AT NIGHT AND DURING INCLIMATE WEATHER.  CONDITION B DEVICES ARE SERVICEABLE AND READY FOR USE.

THE NEW CASTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD USE THESE SHOULDER STRAPS TO COMPLETE RUCK FRAMES WE HAVE THAT HAVE NO STRAPS.  THE COMPLETED RUCK SACKS ARE ISSUED TO SWAT OFFICERS FOR USE IN CARRYING AND STORING PERSONAL EQUIPMENT FOR USE DURING EXTENDED SWAT OPERATIONS.
THE NEW CASTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD USE THIS BAG FOR STORING EQUIPMENT LIKE FIRST AID KITS, CRIME SCENE TAPE, ROAD FLARES, AND REFLECTIVE VESTS IN THE TRUNK OF A CRUISER.
THE NEW CASTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD USE THIS BATTERY CHARGER FOR CHARGING BATTERIES FOR OUR MARCBOT IV EOD ROBOT.  WE CURRENTLY HAVE NO WAY OF CHARGING BATTERIES FOR THE UNIT.

THE NEW CASTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD USE THIS SELECTOR KIT TO EQUIP 1 DEPARTMENT OWNED M16 WITH AN AMBIDEXTROUS FIRE CONTROL SELECTOR.  THIS WOULD BE BENEFICIAL TO THE LEFT HANDED OFFICERS ON THE DEPARTMENT BY ENABLING THEM TO MORE EASILY MANIPULATE THE SELECTOR WITHOUT CHANGING THEIR GRIP ON THE WEAPON.
THE NEW CASTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD USE THIS ENGRAVING MACHINE TO MARK DEPARTMENT OWNED EQUIPMENT AND PROPERTY WITH NON-REMOVABLE IDENTIFICATION TAGS.
THE NEW CASTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD ISSUE THIS RIGGERS BELT TO ONE SWAT OFFICER.  THE BELT IS CAPABLE OF BEING USED AS A DRAG HANDLE AND AN EMERGENCY RAPPEL HARNESS.

THE NEW CASTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD EQUIP ONE SUPPRESSED M4 CARBINE WITH THIS M84 CHARGING HANDLE.  THE M84 CHARGING HANDLE IS SPECIALLY DESIGNED TO PREVENT GAS FROM ESCAPING FROM THE RECEIVER AREA OF A M4 RIFLE THAT IS EQUIPPED WITH A SOUND SUPPRESSOR.  THE ESCAPING GAS CAN BURN AND DISTRACT AN OPERATOR DURING THE ENGAGEMENT OF TARGETS WHEN USING A SUPPRESSOR.

THE NEW CASTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD USE THIS MICROMETER FOR MAKING ACCURATE MEASUREMENTS OF CUSTOM FABRICATED SWAT EQUIPMENT AND SWAT RELATED MODIFICATIONS TO OUR MRAP USING THE LATHE AND MILLING MACHINE WE OBTAINED FROM 1033.

THE NEW CASTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD FIT THIS TRUCK MOUNTED CRANE TO ONE OF THE TRUCKS WE OBTAINED FROM 1033.  THIS CRANE IS DESIGNED TO MOUNT TO THE REAR OF A TRUCK BED AND WOULD ASSIST US IN LIFTING HEAVY ITEMS INTO THE BED AND REDUCE THE RISK OF INJURY TO OFFICERS.
